definition: Aries (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Yangcheng, a nickname for 廣州|广州[Guang3 zhou1]
Qingyang district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan
lit. to mend the pen after sheep are lost (idiom)/fig. to act belatedly/better late than never/to lock the stable door after the horse has bolted

sentences.english: Rib meat sheep will be washed, cut into 4 cm square block.
sentences.chinese: 将羊肋条肉洗净，切成4厘米见方的块。

sentences.english: The infection or venom from the bite could kill them.
sentences.chinese: 这一口带来的感染和毒液就可能杀死我的羊。

sentences.english: Dall's sheep and mountain goats are found in the park's alpine environment.
sentences.chinese: 公园的山区还有大角羊和山羊出没。

sentences.english: The sheep were herded into the pasture.
From then on, the sheep of this shepherd hadn't been thieved by the wolf any more.
sentences.chinese: 从此，那个牧民的羊就再也没有被家狼叼走过了。

sentences.english: Sharon shouldn't shout at the sheep.
At last the goatherd threw a stone, and breaking its horn.
sentences.chinese: 最后这个牧羊人扔了块石头打破了羊的角。

sentences.english: In the country, he can hear the birds singing and sheep bleating .
sentences.chinese: 在乡下，他能听到鸟儿歌唱和羊的叫声。

sentences.english: If a man owns a hundred sheep, and one of them wanders away, will he not leave the ninety-nine on the hills and go to look for the one that wandered off?
sentences.chinese: 他岂不撇下这九十九只，往山里去找那只迷路的羊么。

sentences.english: Three goats belonging to local farmers are still missing.
sentences.chinese: 当地农民的另外三只羊也失踪了。

sentences.english: Several wolves were rending a lamb to pieces.
sentences.chinese: 几条狼正在把一只羊撕扯成碎块。

sentences.english: The vine growers killed the sheep of the dwellers in the hills .
sentences.chinese: 种葡萄的人杀死了山里人的羊。

sentences.english: The lone ITep is in danger of the wolf.
sentences.chinese: 孤独的羊难免遭狼的危险。

sentences.english: Every one takes it from bottom of the rack.
sentences.chinese: 每只羊都从干草架底吃草。

sentences.english: The wolf and the sheep are not qualified to talk about freedom.
sentences.chinese: 狼和羊都没有资格谈论自由。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content icariin in the extract of Gushuling.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定骨疏灵提取物中淫羊藿苷的含量。
